tasks.title: Stabilize sensor array
tasks.description: Mark needs to ensure the new sensor array, currently 80% assembled, is stabilized to address calibration issues with temperature sensors.
tasks.evidence: Elena: Okay, can you have it stabilized by end of the week? Mark: I’m pushing for it, but might need extra help.

tasks.title: Assist with sensor array stabilization
tasks.description: Jin will spare time on Thursday to assist Mark with the sensor array stabilization efforts.
tasks.evidence: Jin: I can spare some time Thursday to assist.

tasks.title: Implement power smoothing circuit
tasks.description: Sofia will implement a power smoothing circuit to mitigate intermittent resets on the main control board, which are suspected to be caused by power spikes.
tasks.evidence: Sofia: Implementing a power smoothing circuit, hoping that helps.

tasks.title: Coordinate to verify power supply stability
tasks.description: Mark will coordinate with Jin to verify the stability of the power supply, likely related to the power spike issue causing firmware resets.
tasks.evidence: Mark: I’ll coordinate with Jin to verify power supply stability.

tasks.title: Analyze battery runtime discrepancy
tasks.description: Mark needs to analyze why the actual battery runtime is 15% less than specification.
tasks.evidence: Elena: Prioritize analyzing that this week. Mark: Will do.

tasks.title: Work on environmental noise mitigation in firmware
tasks.description: Jin will work on mitigating environmental noise within the firmware, in preparation for the field test next month.
tasks.evidence: Jin: I’ll work on environmental noise mitigation in the firmware.

tasks.title: Design adjustable mechanical mounts
tasks.description: Sofia's team is designing adjustable mounts to compensate for alignment issues encountered during assembly, which could cause sensor misreads.
tasks.evidence: Sofia: We’re designing adjustable mounts to compensate.

tasks.title: Improve sensor fusion algorithms
tasks.description: Mark is collaborating with Jin to improve sensor fusion algorithms, specifically focusing on handling noisy inputs.
tasks.evidence: Mark: On software, I’m collaborating with Jin on improving sensor fusion algorithms to handle noisy inputs.

tasks.title: Tweak Kalman filter for sensor fusion
tasks.description: Jin is working on a specific tweak to the Kalman filter as part of the effort to improve sensor fusion algorithms.
tasks.evidence: Jin: Yeah, working on a Kalman filter tweak.

tasks.title: Update integration guide documentation
tasks.description: Sofia's team is responsible for updating the integration guide documentation.
tasks.evidence: Sofia: For documentation, we’re updating the integration guide this week.

tasks.title: Chase vendor for custom cable delivery
tasks.description: Mark needs to continue chasing the vendor regarding the delay in custom cable delivery, which has moved from Monday to Thursday.
tasks.evidence: Mark: One blocker is the delay in custom cables — vendor moved delivery from Monday to Thursday. Elena: Keep chasing.

tasks.title: Provide support for power analysis if needed
tasks.description: Mark has offered to pitch in and support Jin with power analysis if Jin requires assistance.
tasks.evidence: Elena: Alright, if needed, Mark can support.

tasks.title: Prep demo slides and data
tasks.description: The team needs to prepare slides and data for the upcoming demo, focusing on reliable sensors, battery endurance, stable firmware, and the new mounting design.
tasks.evidence: Elena: Let’s prep slides and data for that.

tasks.title: Debug intermittent firmware crashes
tasks.description: Mark's team needs to debug the intermittent firmware crashes that have been reported during testing.
tasks.evidence: Mark: On testing, some intermittent firmware crashes were reported. We need to debug.

tasks.title: Set up detailed logs for firmware debugging
tasks.description: Jin will set up detailed logs to aid in debugging the intermittent firmware crashes.
tasks.evidence: Jin: I’ll set up detailed logs for that.

tasks.title: Track integration issues
tasks.description: Sofia will track integration issues on an ongoing basis.
tasks.evidence: Sofia: I’ll track integration issues and help with testing.

tasks.title: Help with lab and outdoor testing
tasks.description: Sofia will assist with the planned lab tests (next two weeks) and outdoor trials (following week) for all components.
tasks.deadline: Next two weeks (lab tests), then following week (outdoor trials)
tasks.evidence: Sofia: I’ll track integration issues and help with testing.

analysis_results.meeting_summary: The team discussed the hardware prototype's progress, focusing on stabilizing the sensor array, investigating firmware resets and battery runtime discrepancies, and preparing for an upcoming field test. Key actions include addressing power issues, refining sensor fusion algorithms, and updating documentation, while managing custom cable delays as a critical risk.
decisions: Jin will assist Mark with sensor array stabilization starting Thursday.
A power smoothing circuit will be implemented by Sofia to mitigate intermittent firmware resets.
Analysis of the battery runtime discrepancy is prioritized for this week, owned by Mark.
Jin will work on environmental noise mitigation in the firmware.
Sofia's team will design adjustable mechanical mounts to address assembly alignment issues.
The integration guide documentation will be updated this week by Sofia's team.
Elena directed Mark to keep chasing the vendor for custom cable delivery.
Mark will provide support to Jin for power analysis if needed.
The team will prep slides and data for the demo, focusing on reliable sensors, battery endurance, stable firmware, and new mounting design.
Jin will set up detailed logs to assist with debugging intermittent firmware crashes.
